question: Gandhiji went to South Africa to handle a case of which of the following Organizations?
explanation: Dada Abdullah was a businessman in South Africa. Gandhiji went to South Africa in 1893 to handle a case of Dada Abdullah & Co. Being a domicile of Gujarat, Dada Abdullah dealt all his case in Gujrati language. But in South Africa, there was no Gujrati speaking lawyer. That is why he invited Gandhiji to handle the case.
